description: Scalar energy head with NO mining (strategy=none). Apples-to-apples vs q101 (no mining, vector energy) and q207 (scalar energy, adversarial mining). Determines whether scalar head matches historical 0.009 baseline or introduces its own plateau.
notes: Key diagnostic: identical to q207 except mining_strategy=none. If val MSE returns to ~0.009 (matching q101), scalar head is fine and adversarial mining is the culprit for q207 plateau. If still plateaus at ~0.09, scalar head itself is limiting performance.
